insert into t_check_person (name, unit_name, duty, phone, create_time, modify_time, memo) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_check_person set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duty = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, unit_name, duty, phone, create_time, modify_time, memo from t_check_person
